name: AaveStrategy
description: Interacts with Aave V2 protocol (or forks) to generate interest for the pool. This contract it's responsible for deposits and withdrawals to the external pool as well as getting the generated rewards and sending them back to the pool.

functionDecorators.name: earlyWithdraw
functionDecorators.description: Withdraws funds from aave in case of an early withdrawal.

parameterDecorators.name: _minAmount
parameterDecorators.description: Used for aam strategies, since every strategy overrides from the same strategy interface hence it is defined here. _minAmount isn't needed in this strategy but since all strategies override from the same interface and the amm strategies need it hence it is used here.

functionDecorators.name: getAccumulatedRewardTokenAmounts
functionDecorators.description: Returns total accumulated reward token amount.

functionDecorators.name: getNetDepositAmount
functionDecorators.description: Get the expected net deposit amount (amount minus slippage) for a given amount. Used only for AMM strategies.

functionDecorators.name: getRewardTokens
functionDecorators.description: Returns the instances of the reward tokens.

functionDecorators.name: getTotalAmount
functionDecorators.description: Returns the total accumulated amount (i.e., principal + interest) stored in curve. Intended for usage by external clients and in case of variable deposit pools.

functionDecorators.name: getUnderlyingAsset
functionDecorators.description: Returns the underlying inbound (deposit) token address.

functionDecorators.name: incentiveController
functionDecorators.description: Address of the Aave V2 incentive controller contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _minAmount
parameterDecorators.description: Used for aam strategies, since every strategy overrides from the same strategy interface hence it is defined here. _minAmount isn't needed in this strategy but since all strategies override from the same interface and the amm strategies need it hence it is used here.

functionDecorators.name: lendingPoolAddressProvider
functionDecorators.description: Which Aave instance we use to swap Inbound Token to interest bearing aDAI.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: redeem
functionDecorators.description: Redeems funds from aave when the waiting round for the good ghosting pool is over.

parameterDecorators.name: variableDeposits
parameterDecorators.description: Bool Flag which determines whether the deposit is to be made in context of a variable deposit pool or not.

parameterDecorators.name: _minAmount
parameterDecorators.description: Used for aam strategies, since every strategy overrides from the same strategy interface hence it is defined here. _minAmount isn't needed in this strategy but since all strategies override from the same interface and the amm strategies need it hence it is used here.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: rewardToken
functionDecorators.description: reward token address for eg wmatic in case of polygon deployment.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: wethGateway
functionDecorators.description: Address of the Aave V2 weth gateway contract.
